content: I think I'll create a sign-up sheet with some general guidelines, that way people can still be creative but we'll have a good variety of dishes. And I'll make sure to remind everyone to bring enough for 8-10 people. Thanks for the advice! By the way, I'm also thinking of inviting my colleague Sarah, she recently adopted a child from Ethiopia, a girl named Aaliyah, and I'd love to catch up with her.
